ValidationRule.description: This rule prevents the user from making changes to any field except the dates, descriptions, and/or the status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Setup.cgcloud__Validation_Rules_Setting__c.cgcloud__Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Status__c, 'Initial'), ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Fund_Template__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Currency__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Account__c) || ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Anchor_Product__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the dates, descriptions, and status fields can be changed.
